snippet.title: Building An App From Scratch: Building it with Flutter | #2
snippet.description:
#Flutter #Python #Programming
Building An App From Scratch: Building it with Flutter | #2

"Clean Code Friday"
If you want to receive one short email from me every week, where I go through a few of the most useful things I have explored and discovered this week. Things like; favourite apps, articles, podcasts, books, coding tips and tricks. Then feel free to join https://kalletech.com/clean-code-friday/

If you want to know how to make an app, then I this might be for you. I am going to build an app from start to finish using Flutter and Python and we are going to go from just an idea to a finished app that's published in the different app stores. AND I will do it live so you can literally just watch all of this series and do exactly what I do and then you will have a complete app.

We are going to build the UI using Flutter and the backend using Python for a REST API and SQLite for the database.

If you want to join me live you can do so on Mondays at 14:00 Central European Time. On twitch: https://www.twitch.tv/kallehallden

CONTACT: halldenkalle@gmail.com

Follow me on:

TWITCH: https://www.twitch.tv/kallehallden
INSTAGRAM: https://www.instagram.com/kallehallden/
TWITTER: https://twitter.com/kallehallden
GITHUB: https://github.com/kallehallden


--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
